This is direct port of korean.php

Korean PDF support.

Usage is as follows:

require ‘fpdf’ require ‘chinese’ pdf = FPDF.new pdf.extend(PDF_Korean)

This allows it to be combined with other extensions, such as the bookmark module.

[Validate]
